cardDonation.description: Every Friday your company can collect small change after lunch. Even small amounts of money can change the lives of many people. Simply collect the funds in a special box or transfer them to our account. Try practicing this with your whole team or department. Don’t forget to report the results once a month, and you'll be amazed at how significant your help can be. The larger the company, the more vulnerable the object of support. Choose an animal shelter or a small local project to support and feel their gratitude.
cardDonation.title: Small change from lunches

corporateFridays.description: Make it a habit to contribute the change from your coffee or pizza to a single card or a jointly chosen fund. Even a few euro will unite your company into a team, and meetings will become warmer and more meaningful. Choose a project that is close to you mentally or professionally. Support a small pet project with funds for technical equipment or a local art community. Focus on projects with long-term impact, and one day you will be able to say: 'I am part of it too!'
corporateFridays.title: Shared donations during meetings with friends

weeklyLoteries.description: Every Friday in the office, you can organize a giveaway of small pleasant items or useful things: a book related to your field, a new mouse, or a set of stickers. The main thing is consistency and usefulness for the recipient. After a month, see how small amounts have turned into significant help. Choose one project or one direction and track its progress throughout the year – from season to season.
weeklyLoteries.title: Office auction

eventsSection.subtitle: Support us your way: Choose your donation method
eventsSection.title: Events

helpNowSection.title-p-1: We are also grateful for the support of Baza Trainee Ukraine.
helpNowSection.title-p-2: This allows us to support even more participants on their professional development journey.
